attributes.action: deal with the real problems in the world (third world debt, hunger, violence) rather than waste time on political tittle tattle and a flu outbreak that is doing nothing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now clear that Swine-flu is no more dangerous than the normal seasonal flue. Whilst middle class people everywhere worry about house prices, flu that they will never get and the speed limit people all over the world are dying because we refuse to treat world hunger and disease properly.
